title: Ping is driving me crazy, need answers
body: So I play League at my cousin's house, and we've been having ms issues. My ping is almost always at 115-130 MS since 6.14, and when mine is at 115 his is around 60. But after a game or two his will be at 115-130 and mine will be at 60 ish. Sometimes we'll both have 115-130 so it won't even matter. We've tried everything including re-installing, and I even invested in an ethernet cable which only made my ping a stable 160 ms. Any answers or tips would be great, thank you so much for your time.

replies.body: It sounds like your network might be experiencing packet loss which is causing delays in your games.  I think switching to an ethernet is an excellent troubleshooting step, and we can dig into some more solutions.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) which is a tool that will get an overview of your matches and see what's going wrong.  It will then provide some steps to help get this fixed up.  Let me know how this works for you, or if the problem continues.
Can you please try fixing this instead of suggesting it's always an Internet connection problem when it's clearly not?

"Your average ping was 113 milliseconds."

"The worst ping you experienced was 113ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this."

"Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 0.00%.
Overall, this means you had a low amount of packets lost during the game."

Also, I tried wired connection and it only made it worse. 113 ping was just one of the logs I pasted, almost all of the ones I tried had 110+ with 0.00% packet loss. I don't understand what the issue is.

Thanks for following up on this!  When you have some time, submit a ticket and our tech team can look into this further with you.  I also recommend using the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to automatically gather a set of logs and attach it to that ticket for context.  Thanks for your patience!
